apps.name: Netflix
apps.description:
Looking for the most talked about TV shows and movies from around the world? They're all on Netflix.

We've got award-winning series, movies, documentaries, and stand-up specials. And with the mobile app, you get Netflix while you travel, commute, or just take a break.

What you'll love about Netflix:

• We add TV shows and movies all the time. Browse new titles or search for your favorites, and stream videos right on your device.
• The more you watch, the better Netflix gets at recommending TV shows and movies you'll love.
• Create up to five profiles for an account. Profiles give different members of your household their own personalized Netflix.
• Enjoy a safe watching experience just for kids with family-friendly entertainment.
• Preview quick videos of our series and movies and get notifications for new episodes and releases.
• Save your data. Download titles to your mobile device and watch offline, wherever you are.

apps.name: WhatsApp Messenger
apps.description:
WhatsApp from Meta is a FREE messaging and video calling app. It's used by over 2B people in more than 180 countries. It's simple, reliable, and private, so you can easily keep in touch with your friends and family. WhatsApp works across mobile and desktop even on slow connections.

Privacy and security is in our DNA, which is why we built end-to-end encryption into our app. When end-to-end encrypted, your messages, photos, videos, voice messages, documents, status updates and calls are secured from falling into the wrong hands.

apps.name: Amazon Shopping
apps.description: Browse, search, and buy with the Amazon Shopping app. Shop deals, enjoy personalized recommendations, and more. Get fast, free shipping on eligible orders. Enjoy access to Amazon Prime, Gold Box Deals, Alexa, secure ordering, and more. The Amazon app helps you find products, shop deals, make orders, track shipments, watch video products, manage your Amazon account, and much more.

apps.name: TikTok
apps.description: TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you're a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there's something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don't, and you'll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

apps.name: Instagram
apps.description:
Bring your friends closer with Instagram. Share photos and videos, send messages, get to know brands, creators and more. Express yourself and connect with friends.

* Add photos and videos to your Instagram Story that disappear after 24 hours, and bring them to life with fun creative tools.
* Message your friends with Messenger. Share and connect over what you see on Feed and Stories.
* Create and discover short, entertaining videos on Instagram with Reels.
* Post photos and videos to your feed that you want to show on your profile.

apps.name: Cash App
apps.description: Cash App is the easy way to send, spend, bank, and invest. Sending and receiving money is free and fast, and most payments can be deposited directly to a bank account in just a few seconds. You can use Cash App to pay for goods and services or to split a bill with friends. In some areas, you can also use Cash App to invest in stocks with as little as $1 or buy and sell bitcoin. With Cash App, you receive a free Visa debit card — the Cash Card — that can be used to withdraw money for free at ATMs or to make purchases anywhere Visa is accepted.

apps.name: DoorDash - Food Delivery
apps.description: DoorDash is an all-in-one food delivery app connecting you to the best of your neighborhood. Order from your local favorites, get your groceries delivered, or pick up dinner to go. Get what you want, when you want it, delivered to your door. DoorDash offers the greatest selection of your favorite local and national restaurants, convenience stores, and grocery stores—more than 300,000 partners in the US, Canada, Australia, Japan, and Germany. Spend more time living and less time waiting for food with our on-demand delivery app.

apps.name: Spotify: Music & Podcasts
apps.description:
With Spotify, you can play millions of songs and podcasts for free. Listen to the songs and podcasts you love and find music from all around the world.

Discover new music, podcasts, and more based on what you already love or what's trending around the world right now.

Create and share your playlists or just sit back and be introduced to new music. Search for your favorite song, artist, or podcast; or browse through categories like:
- Trending and chart-topping new releases
- Podcasts in every genre, including true crime, comedy, lifestyle, education, sci-fi, and fantasy
- Workout, Sleep, Party, Focus, and Relax

apps.name: Uber - Request a ride
apps.description: Request a ride to wherever you need to go. The Uber app is the easiest way to get around. Just open the app and enter your destination, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably. Compare prices on every ride option, from economy to premium. And on uberX, uberXL, and Comfort, you can add multiple destinations to your trip. Plus, know your driver in advance with the driver profile and track your trip in real-time from pickup to dropoff.

apps.name: Telegram
apps.description: Telegram is a cloud-based mobile and desktop messaging app with a focus on security and speed. Telegram is free and open source, allowing anyone to verify its encryption and API. It lets you create group chats with up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents, and make voice and video calls. Its 'Secret Chats' feature offers end-to-end encryption, leaving no trace on servers. The app also allows you to access your messages from multiple devices and provides extensive customization.
